Name: BlockDude
About the game: You are a scientist trapped in an hazardous research facility! You need to find your way out of this mess! Bad news is that you'll have to lift toxic wastes bare-handed to reach the exit doors :/ This maze of White Mesa Research Facility will mess with your brain through 30+ levels (more will come). Including the very classic levels from Texas Instrument calculator!!! Any feedback is more than welcome, don't hesitate to express any feeling ! Special thanks for/to: - SFX by Little Robot Sound Factory - Music by Snabisch - Development with Poulpe & Gg - Original idea by Detached Solution
